ComicInfo.Title: Thanks For Coming; The Curse of the Crimson Corsair: The Evil That Men Do, Part Six
ComicInfo.Summary:
The rift with Rorschach widens as Nite Owl grows closer to the mysterious and deadly Twilight Lady. Meanwhile, a stone-cold killer continues to terrorize New York City. Find out what connects these events!
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/before-watchmen-nite-owl-3-thanks-for-coming-the-c/4000-357635/
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.5.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-09-17 17:05:25. [Issue ID 357635]
ComicInfo.Inker: Bill Sienkiewicz, Joe Kubert, John Higgins
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Andy Kubert, Brad Anderson, Chris Samnee, Joe Kubert, Matthew Wilson
ComicInfo.Editor: Camilla Zhang, Mark Doyle, Will Dennis
ComicInfo.Characters: Nite Owl (Dreiberg), Nite Owl (Mason), Rorschach, Twilight Lady
